title: `--target=msp430-elf{,bare}`: `internal compiler error: Segmentation fault` during `-fself-test=../../gccrs/gcc/testsuite/selftests`
body:
Hi!

It seems there's currently a build status difference for `--target=msp430-elf` and `--target=msp430-elfbare` when I compare the GCC build (upstream GCC at 6010189923908501ca5b02bd1f4aee05d2283118 vs. Rust GCC tree at 26b19976c898dd08f7234dc179ad57085f974b1a):

```
[all 2023-03-07 19:50:10] /var/lib/laminar/run/gccrs-msp430-elfbare/2/toolchain-build/./gcc/xgcc -B/var/lib/laminar/run/gccrs-msp430-elfbare/2/toolchain-build/./gcc/  -xc -nostdinc /dev/null -S -o /dev/null -fself-test=../../gccrs/gcc/testsuite/selftests
[all 2023-03-07 19:50:24] -fself-test: 57323 pass(es) in 1.293806 seconds
[all 2023-03-07 19:50:24] echo timestamp > s-selftest-c
[all 2023-03-07 19:50:24] /var/lib/laminar/run/gccrs-msp430-elfbare/2/toolchain-build/./gcc/xgcc -B/var/lib/laminar/run/gccrs-msp430-elfbare/2/toolchain-build/./gcc/  -xc++ -nostdinc /dev/null -S -o /dev/null -fself-test=../../gccrs/gcc/testsuite/selftests
[all 2023-03-07 19:50:39] -fself-test: 57353 pass(es) in 1.242157 seconds
[all 2023-03-07 19:50:39] echo timestamp > s-selftest-c++
[all 2023-03-07 19:50:39] /var/lib/laminar/run/gccrs-msp430-elfbare/2/toolchain-build/./gcc/xgcc -B/var/lib/laminar/run/gccrs-msp430-elfbare/2/toolchain-build/./gcc/  -xrust -frust-incomplete-and-experimental-compiler-do-not-use -nostdinc /dev/null -S -o /dev/null -fself-test=../../gccrs/gcc/testsuite/selftests
[all 2023-03-07 19:50:39] <built-in>: internal compiler error: Segmentation fault
[all 2023-03-07 19:50:39] 0xfe322f crash_signal
[all 2023-03-07 19:50:39] 	../../gccrs/gcc/toplev.cc:314
[all 2023-03-07 19:50:40] 0x12c19c7 build_function_type(tree_node*, tree_node*, bool)
[all 2023-03-07 19:50:40] 	../../gccrs/gcc/tree.cc:7447
[all 2023-03-07 19:50:40] 0x12c1d20 build_function_type_list(tree_node*, ...)
[all 2023-03-07 19:50:40] 	../../gccrs/gcc/tree.cc:7529
[all 2023-03-07 19:50:40] 0x12c22bd build_common_builtin_nodes()
[all 2023-03-07 19:50:40] 	../../gccrs/gcc/tree.cc:9977
[all 2023-03-07 19:50:40] 0x89fe64 grs_langhook_init
[all 2023-03-07 19:50:40] 	../../gccrs/gcc/rust/rust-lang.cc:133
[all 2023-03-07 19:50:40] 0x89daca lang_dependent_init
[all 2023-03-07 19:50:40] 	../../gccrs/gcc/toplev.cc:1815
[all 2023-03-07 19:50:40] 0x89daca do_compile
[all 2023-03-07 19:50:40] 	../../gccrs/gcc/toplev.cc:2110
[all 2023-03-07 19:50:40] Please submit a full bug report, with preprocessed source (by using -freport-bug).
[all 2023-03-07 19:50:40] Please include the complete backtrace with any bug report.
[all 2023-03-07 19:50:40] See <https://gcc.gnu.org/bugs/> for instructions.
[all 2023-03-07 19:50:40] make[1]: *** [../../gccrs/gcc/rust/Make-lang.in:292: s-selftest-rust] Error 1
[all 2023-03-07 19:50:40] rm m2/gm2-compiler-boot/P2Build.mod gfdl.pod gcc.pod gfortran.pod gcov-dump.pod gcov-tool.pod fsf-funding.pod gpl.pod cpp.pod m2/gm2-compiler-boot/P0SyntaxCheck.mod gcov.pod m2.pod lto-dump.pod m2/gm2-compiler-boot/PCBuild.mod gccgo.pod m2/gm2-compiler-boot/PHBuild.mod m2/gm2-compiler-boot/P1Build.mod m2/gm2-compiler-boot/P3Build.mod gdc.pod
[all 2023-03-07 19:50:40] make[1]: Leaving directory '/var/lib/laminar/run/gccrs-msp430-elfbare/2/toolchain-build/gcc'
[all 2023-03-07 19:50:40] make: *** [Makefile:4619: all-gcc] Error 2
```
(Build log at http://toolchain.lug-owl.de/laminar/jobs/gccrs-msp430-elfbare/2)
